Title: Corrigendum: Regioselective Organocatalytic Formation of Carbamates from Substituted Cyclic Carbonates (Adv. Synth. Catal. (2016), 13, 2172-2178, DOI: 10.1002/adsc.201600290)
Abstract: © 2016 WILEY-VCH Verlag GmbH & Co. KGaA, WeinheimFor the full paper by Sergio SopeÇa, Victor Laserna, Wusheng Guo, Eddy Martin, Eduardo C. Escudero-Ad‚n, and Arjan W. Kleij, in Issue 13, 2016, pp. 2172–2178 (DOI: 10.1002/adsc.201600290), a reference to related work is missing. Therefore, the following corrections are needed. On page 2173, left column: current version “As far as we know, there is only one report that shows complete regiocontrol in the (non-catalyzed) aminolysis of an a-trifluoromethyl-substituted carbonate[14a] but examples of such exquisite selectivity remain extremely limited.” new version “As far as we know, there are only a few reports that show complete regiocontrol in the aminolysis of cyclic carbonates[14] and examples of such exquisite selectivity thus remain extremely limited.” On page 2178, right column, an additional reference 14c needs to be added: “c) V. M. Lombardo, E. A. Dhulst, E. K. Leitsch, N. Wilmot, W. H. Heath, A. P. Gies, M. D. Miller, J. M. Torkelson, K. A. Scheidt, Eur. J. Org. Chem. 2015, 2791–2795.”.
